sentences.en: County has a unique tourism resources - Town moraine mouth.
sentences.cn: 临县有独特的旅游资源 —— 碛口古镇.

sentences.en: Moraine Lake , Lake lake are rock, sand - based chip.
sentences.cn: 冰碛湖的湖底湖畔则以岩块 、 砂屑为主.

sentences.en: Moraine Xin, Xin Bao highway transit.
sentences.cn: 忻碛 、 忻保公路过境.

sentences.en: Our tents were pitched on a sandy moraine shore opposite the massive Blomstrand Glacier – a monster of moving ice that lets out groans and cracks as it calves icebergs into the sea.
sentences.cn: 我们的帐篷搭在沙石的海岸上，对面是巨大的布鲁姆斯特莱德冰川，这是一块庞大的浮冰，当它的冰山融入海水中时，发出吱吱嘎嘎的声音。

sentences.en: The ground is covered with moraine.
We hiked to the top of the moraine and had a better view of the lake.
sentences.cn: 我走到冰碛石顶部,才有拍摄此湖的较佳视野.

trans.tran_en: a mass of earth or pieces of rock moved along by a  glacier  and left in a line at the bottom of it
